adjectives.description: knucklesome (comparative more knucklesome, superlative most knucklesome)

entries.meaning: (literally and figurative) Characterised or marked by knuckle(s); knuckly
examples: He was wearing his high school ring, a Florida ring, an ugly garnet stone with a turd shape engraved on it—a manatee, the high school mascot— which caused Kiwi to look down at his own naked, knucklesome fingers in alarm.
